name: Dinner with Nana
description:
It's time for your monthly visit to your weird old grandmother. Must have made a deal with the devil to afford to build this place. Not sure why she would need a fort in the middle of nowhere, but I digress. It is your duty as the grandchild to prepare a delicious meal  while you wait for nan.

Features:
Full soundscape
Pickupable items
Cute low-poly aesthetic

This experience is optimized for Occulus VR devices. Tested on HTC Vive.

Full credits list in zip.

To come:
Scripted events
Cooler interactions
Locomotion controls
Various quality of life updates

(this is my first Unreal project, please be kind)
